block.circube.andesite_light.tooltip.beh: Emit _light_, suppress _monster spawn_ based on _Kinetic Impact_
block.circube.andesite_light.tooltip.sum: More than a lamp, there is _soul power_ inside
block.circube.brass_light.tooltip.behavi: Emit _light_, suppress _monster spawn_ based on _Kinetic Impact_
block.circube.brass_light.tooltip.summar: More than a lamp, there is _soul power_ inside
item.circube.four_sided_die.tooltip.beha: Roll a dice of _1-4_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.six_sided_die.tooltip.behav: Roll a dice of _1-6_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.eight_sided_die.tooltip.beh: Roll a dice of _1-8_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.ten_sided_die.tooltip.behav: Roll a dice of _1-10_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.twelve_sided_die.tooltip.be: Roll a dice of _1-12_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.twenty_sided_die.tooltip.be: Roll a dice of _1-20_ points. Multiple dice can be rolled at once.
item.circube.stabilizer.tooltip.behaviou: _Crush_ Stabilizer, teleport you to _unlocked_ Mechanical Beacons or _other players_
item.circube.stabilizer.tooltip.summary: Stabilizer is a consumable that needs to be used for teleportation
